about_the_game:
while True: learn() Art Pack contains more than 50 images drawn during the whole development process: pictures of all existing cats, never shown to the public before, first-day sketches, and unique wallpapers.

To find the downloaded Art Pack please click with Right Mouse Button on while True: learn() in your Steam Library > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files. You will find all the files in a directory named "Art Pack".
detailed_description:
while True: learn() Art Pack contains more than 50 images drawn during the whole development process: pictures of all existing cats, never shown to the public before, first-day sketches, and unique wallpapers.

To find the downloaded Art Pack please click with Right Mouse Button on while True: learn() in your Steam Library > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files. You will find all the files in a directory named "Art Pack".
legal_notice: All rights reserved. All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
